introduction.html:p: The project is in incubation. The objective is to provide an effective EMF software factory tool in June 2010.

release_deliverables.html:p: Every EGF deliverable is the EGF engine with a few basic factories. Examples of factories are provided in the EGF wiki.

target_environments.html:p: EGF 0.1.0 and 0.2.x runs on Eclipse 3.5 and requires Java 5.x
EGF 0.1.0 embeds Antlr runtime 3.0, Log4J 1.2.13, and Jet-1.
EGF extensions and portfolios embeds their own bundles, with their own IP issues

internationalization.html:p: None of the EGF deliverables are internationalized.

preamble.html:p: The EGF project is divided into four kinds of activities: EGF Engine, Generation Pattern, User Interfaces, and the EGF portfolios.

html:ul.html:li: 0.2.0: The initial version 0.1.0 was not extensible. This implied a complete refactoring: EGF model, infrastructure, with interface impacts.
0.2.0: are introduced pattern call, pattern injection.
